text:
Champions League
Real Madrid: Karim Benzema makes history
By scoring his team's fourth goal against Galatasaray in the Champions League, Karim Benzema became the second player in history to score in 15 consecutive UEFA Champions League seasons.
06 Nov 2019, 21:06 by Antoine Chirat



Where will Karim Benzema actually be in the hierarchy of the greatest attackers in history? The question arises more and more as the performances and records accumulate for the Frenchman. Tonight, by registering his first goal of the year in the Champions League, he becomes the second player in history, after Lionel Messi apologize, to find the fault in the biggest competition for 15 seasons in a row . Monumental.
